name: Butter Chicken (Homemade)
ingredients: 450 g boneless chicken breast, cut into 1.5 inch cubes
naan bread or papadums as side
instructions: Marinate the chicken by mixing yogurt, oil, tandoori masala, ginger paste, and garlic paste. Add chicken and coat well. Let rest for at least 30 minutes.
Heat ghee in a pan over medium heat. Add sliced onions and cook until soft and golden.
Add ginger paste and garlic paste; sauté briefly.
Add crushed tomatoes, heavy cream, chili powder, coriander, and cumin. Simmer until the sauce thickens.
Cook the marinated chicken in a separate pan until mostly done, then add to the sauce.
Pour in heavy cream and stir. Simmer on low heat until chicken is fully cooked and the sauce thickens.
Finish with garam masala and crushed fenugreek leaves. Stir and serve.
